Ultimatehostings KVM, 1Gbps Port, Starting @ $7/mo! Dallas, Texas, Fully Managed.

 

Location : Incero, Dallas, Tx

 

We have recently launched KVM plans and are glad to present them to you. All our plans are fully managed, we help you in every possible way and we are not limited on the kind of support we provide. We will install scripts, help you reload the OS and do much much more.

 

-----------------------------------

Current Specials:

-----------------------------------

For a limited time we are offering double disk space and bandwidth on all our VPS packages. Once your order is processed contact our support team and they'll upgrade your package instantly. Offer ends 7th October 2013.

 

Get double CPU CORE & RAM if you pay for 6 months in advance.

 

-----------------------------------

All plans include:

-----------------------------------

• KVM / SOLUSVM

• FREE & INSTANT SETUP!

• 24/7 Support

• No long term contracts

• 1 Gbps network connection

• Unlimited Reboots/Reinstalls

• Fully Managed

• Root Access

• Raid 10 Disk Space
